alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT STOREY...SOUTHERN WASHOE AND NORTHERN LYON COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM PDT... At 544 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Damonte Ranch, or 8 miles northwest of Virginia City, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph with brief heavy rainfall. Some ponding of water will be possible on area roads. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reno, Virginia City, Sparks, Lockwood, Washoe City, Damonte Ranch, Northwest Reno, Pleasant Valley, Mogul, Caughlin Ranch, Reno-Tahoe International Airport, Galena, New Washoe City, Hidden Valley, Somersett, Verdi-Mogul, Incline Village-Crystal Bay, Mustang, Mount Rose Ski Area, and Gold Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area
